thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 46 of 227
thread.title: Al

author: Al
title: Al
text:
Honest & knowledgeable sales personnel didn't waste my time with B.S.!
I trust them. Very pleasant experience.
The Macomb Twp. store gets 5 stars!
Corporate gets 4 stars because my mattress delivery was one day later than promised/written on my receipt. This is not the fault of store personnel. Unbeknownst to me, I prepared for delivery one day early. Moved the King bed out and vacuumed, stripped off the mattress pads, mattress topper, sheets, & quilt. So, I had to put everything back. Not a tremendous hassle, but it would've been nice to get a phone call or an email to let me know that before I wasted my time and effort. Same day or next day delivery was not true in my case.
4.5 stars average.
